dcterms:creator: M. De Calm√®s
G. Perennou
dcterms:description: BDLex is a lexical database developed at IRIT containing lexical, phonological, and morphological information. It consists of approximately 440,000 inflected forms with attributes such as spelling, pronunciation, morphosyntactic traits, canonical form (lemma), and a frequency indicator.
dcterms:title: BDLex

dcterms:creator: I. Illina
D. Fohr
D. Jouvet
dcterms:description: The NP-Lor corpus consists of 3,500 proper names (family names) with their spelling, one or more phonetic transcriptions, and origin information (origin tags). Each proper name can have multiple tags, indicating different pronunciations associated with each origin.
dcterms:title: NP-Lor (Corpus du LORIA)
